global.title: Annual difference in number of Norwegian heatwave events between reference and future periods using forcing scenario {scenario}
global.title_no: Endring i antall norske hetebølger for år, ved bruk av utviklingsbane {scenario}.

variable.long_name: Difference in number of Norwegian heatwave events between reference and future periods
variable.description: DIfference in norwegian heat wave events. Change in the number of events with maximum temperature above or equal to 27 degrees (tasmax>=27°C) five days in a row between the reference period (1991-2020) and a future period. The first time step represents the future period 2041-2070, and the second time step represents the future period 2071-2100.
variable.norwegian_description: Differanse i norske hetebølgehendelser. Endring i antall hendelser med maksimumstemperatur over eller like 27 grader (tasmax>=27°C) fem dager på rad mellom referanseperioden (1991-2020) og en fremtidsperiode. Første tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2041-2070, og andre tidsskritt representerer fremtidsperioden 2071-2100.

variable.description: Nordic summer days. Number of days with maximum temperature above or equal to 20 degrees (tasmax>=20 °C) for the period _PERIOD_
variable.norwegian_description: Nordiske sommerdager. Antall dager med maksimumstemperatur over eller lik 20 grader (tasmax>=20 °C) for perioden _PERIOD_
